title: Automatic pantry inventory management with Notion and email notifications
description:
## Pantry Soft-Stock Refill ‚Äî Notion Thresholds ‚Üí Grocery List + Email

### What it does (the vibe)

Your pantry‚Äôs calm concierge. Each evening it checks your Notion **Pantry** for items at or below your **Reorder Level**, adds tidy rows to **Grocery List**, and sends a pretty summary email you can shop from. ‚ú®üõí

### Perfect for

Moms, home managers, and founders who want a kitchen that quietly manages itself‚Äîno last-minute ‚Äúwe‚Äôre out!‚Äù moments.

### Requirements

* n8n with **Notion** + **Email** credentials connected
* Two Notion databases: **Pantry** and **Grocery List**

### Notion schema (copy me)

**Pantry**

* `Name` (title)
* `Quantity` (number)
* `ReorderLevel` (number)
* `Notes` (rich\_text, optional)

**Grocery List**

* `Item` (title)
* `Qty` (number)
* `Status` (select: `To Buy`, `Done`)
* `Source` (text)
* `Notes` (rich\_text, optional)

### How it flows (nodes)

1. **Cron** ‚Äì daily at 6pm (edit to taste)
2. **Notion: Search** ‚Äì finds items at/below `ReorderLevel`
3. **Function** ‚Äì calculates how many to add (`ReorderLevel ‚àí Quantity`, minimum 1)
4. **Notion: Create** ‚Äì writes rows to **Grocery List** with `Status = To Buy`
5. **Function + Email** ‚Äì sends a chic, readable checklist (or a ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre fully stocked ‚ú®‚Äù note if nothing to buy)

### 60-second setup

* Replace placeholders: `YOUR_NOTION_PANTRY_DB`, `YOUR_NOTION_GROCERY_DB`, `YOUR_EMAIL`
* Connect Notion + Email credentials (no secrets in nodes)
* Run once with a test item to confirm a new **Grocery List** row appears
* Adjust the **Cron** time to your evening rhythm

### Nice touches you can toggle

* Add `Source = Auto` to track automation adds
* CC a partner or roommate on the email
* Optional Telegram ping for ‚Äúurgent‚Äù items (milk, diapers, coffee ‚òï)

### Submission notes

* Markdown only ‚úÖ
* No hardcoded API keys ‚úÖ
* Real-world use case, minimal setup ‚úÖ

Enjoy the quiet luxury of a pantry that plans ahead. üíñ
